entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vernon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:52 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 02:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -18.1°C
Wind: WNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:14 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
